name: Pierce Drone
text: [[triggered]] when this scrapbot dismantles a scrapbot, excess damage is dealt to the opposing player

name: Stim Drone
text: ((passive)) this scrapbot's attacks deal +1 damage for each other scrapbot that has attacked this turn

name: Brute Bot
text: <<activate>> discard all Malfunctions, deal 1 damage for each Malfunction discarded

name: Pierce Bot
text: [[triggered]] when this scrapbot dismantles a scrapbot, excess damage is dealt to the opposing player

name: Trigger Bot
text: [[triggered]] when you attack with another scrapbot, deal 1 damage

name: Blitz Mech
text: ((passive)) can attack twice per turn

name: Asset Drone
text: [[triggered]] when this scrapbot is dismantled, draw a card

name: Guard Drone
text: [[triggered]] when damage is dealt to a lane adjacent to this, reduce that damage by 1

name: Spy Bot
text: <<activate>> look at the top 5 cards of your deck. put any of them on the top or bottom of your deck in any order, then draw a card

name: Deflect Bot
text: [[triggered]] when damage is dealt to this scrapbot, that damage is dealt to an adjacent enemy lane instead, then dismantle this

name: Inspire Mech
text: [[triggered]] when this scrapbot takes damage, draw a card

name: Guard Mech
text: [[triggered]] when damage is dealt to a lane adjacent to this, reduce that damage by 1

name: Drain Drone
text: <<activate>> exhaust an enemy scrapbot in an adjacent lane, then dismantle this

name: Zeal Drone
text: [[triggered]] when this scrapbot dismantles a scrapbot, return a Malfunction from your hand or discard pile, then dismantle this

name: Slayer Bot
text: <<activate>> dismantle a scrapbot of cost 3 or less, then dismantle this

name: Shutdown Bot
text: [[triggered]] when this scrapbot deals Malfunction damage, exhaust that many enemy scrapbots, then dismantle this

name: Mend Bot
text: [[triggered]] when this scrapbot deals Malfunction damage, return a Malfunction from your hand or discard pile, then dismantle this

name: Zeal Mech
text: [[triggered]] when this scrapbot dismantles a scrapbot, return a Malfunction from your hand or discard pile, then dismantle this

name: Spike Drone
text: [[triggered]] when this scrapbot deals Malfunction damage, your opponent chooses and discards that many cards

name: Jump Drone
text: <<activate>> move this scrapbot to an adjacent unoccupied lane

name: Acid Drone
text: [[triggered]] when this scrapbot deals Malfunction damage, choose a card in your opponent's discard pile, trash it then trash this

name: Hack Bot
text: [[triggered]] when this scrapbot deals Malfunction damage, choose a Scrapbot in a lane, trash it then trash this

name: Grapple Bot
text: <<activate>> move an enemy scrapbot to an unoccupied lane

name: Spike Mech
text: [[triggered]] when this scrapbot deals Malfunction damage, your opponent chooses and discards that many cards

name: Magnet Drone
text: [[triggered]] when this scrapbot is dismantled, return it to your hand

name: Scan Drone
text: <<activate>> reveal the top card of your deck, gain scrap or energy equal to its scrap cost, then dismantle this

name: Harvest Bot
text: [[triggered]] when this scrapbot dismantles a scrapbot, gain scrap or energy equal to that scrapbot's scrap cost

name: Torch Bot
text: <<activate>> trash a card from the market. gain scrap or energy equal to its scrap cost, then dismantle this

name: Refresh Bot
text: <<activate>> discard all Malfunctions, gain 2 scrap or energy for each Malfunction discarded
